messages.title: Tom Watson, Westminster's Mr Greedy
messages.content: Tom Watson, Westminster's Mr Greedy has spent thousands of pounds of your money on food. It's time to send MPs who abused their expenses a message.

messages.title: Alistair Thompson said
messages.content: "I don't think it is right to expect the taxpayer to pay for trips to Tesco and the mortgage on a second home. I will not claim for these." Send a message to MPs who abused their expenses- Vote for change, Vote Conservative on 6th May.

issues.governance: Send a message to MPs who abused their expenses- Vote for change, Vote Conservative on 6th May.

leaflet.personalStatement: I don't think it is right to expect the taxpayer to pay for trips to Tesco and the mortgage on a second home. I will not claim for these.

images.caption: Tom Watson, Westminster's Mr Greedy has spent thousands of pounds of your money on food. It's time to send MPs who abused their expenses a message.
Alistair Thompson said: "I don't think it is right to expect the taxpayer to pay for trips to Tesco and the mortgage on a second home. I will not claim for these."
